shapes such as cubes, spheres, and cylinders.', 'Extrusion: Extruding a 2-D shape into a 3-D shape by adding depth and width.', 'Subdivision surface modeling: Creating detailed 3-D models by dividing a basic shape into smaller, more detailed pieces.', 'Polygon modeling: Creating 3-D models from scratch using polygons, which are then extruded or subdivided to create more detail.', 'Sculpting: Using a digital sculpting tool to create a 3-D model by manipulating a digital surface.', 'Texture mapping: Applying detailed textures to a 3-D model to give it a realistic appearance.', 'Lighting and shading: Adding light sources and shadows to a 3-D model to give it depth and dimension.', 'Animation: Creating movement and motion in a 3-D model using keyframes, physics simulations, or other techniques.', 'Rendering: Generating an image of the 3-D model from a specific viewpoint and with a particular lighting setup.', 'Post-processing: Enhancing or manipulating the final image of the 3-D model using various techniques such as color correction, depth of field adjustment, or adding special effects.']
